column1: #text=It was Arbor day and because of the occasion I decided to plant a tree in my backyard .
#text=I figured it would help the environment as well as be an oxygen source and in a few years I could maybe cut it down for firewood .
#text=I decided to go down to my local Home Depot and buy tree seeds and a shovel .
#text=I then went back to my house and started uprooting the earth , creating a nice hole of dirt in which to plant my new tree .
#text=I got the tree seed and planted it into the dirt and covered it into the ground .
#text=The good thing about trees are they are low maintenance and pretty self sufficient unlike other plants or flowers .
#text=I still watered it every day to get it going and in a few years I will have a large majestic oak tree to provide shade and a new home for birds and other wildlife .
